rule.edit: Yongera oba okulongoosa ebiyingiziddwa mu mateeka
rule.description: Osobola okuyingiza ensengeka eno ng’oyita mu menu y’okunyiga ku ddyo ku mukutu gwonna Bw’oba ​​oyingira okuva ku mukutu gwa yintaneeti, URL y’olupapula lw’omukutu ejja kwongerwako ng’etteeka mu butonde Osobola okulongoosa amateeka .

url.title: Omutindo gwa URL, URL enzijuvu.
url.explain: Enkola eno esobola okukwatagana ne URL enzijuvu.

glob.title: Enkola ya glob ekozesa etterekero lya {{1}} Nsaba laba ku nkozesa, oba osobola okunoonya enkozesa ya {{2}}.

example.a: {{1}}, ekwatagana n'olupapula lwa YouTube n'olupapula olutono lwonna.

regexp.title: Okwolesebwa okwa bulijjo, nsaba olabe Laba ku nkozesa.
